text:
If you have a real use-case, not something so broken as to write indefinitely to
the output stream, please attach it to this bugzilla issue and we'll be glad to
analyze this further.

creator: reweiner@yahoo.com
text:
This is a real case. We have this problem when writing a chat application 
where clients are connects all the time receiving input from other users. If a 
user disconnects, we have to break the loop and inform the other users on the 
exception raised that user "Y" left the conversation.

I just rewrote a piece of the application to ilustrate it better.

creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
text:
Detection of aborted client connections got broken in 1.2.14. This has been
fixed in 1.2.19.
